description:
Having worked much too hard, Mile and the others decide the Crimson Vow should cease activities for a little while. In plain terms this means... That`s right, every working person`s inalienable right —— a vacation! While each of the friends enjoys their time off in their own way, Mile, with her sad history as a master of spending time by herself in her previous life, goes off to savor her time off on her own, but...
Also, on an unrelated note, this episode contains swimsuits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !ألم أقل أننا ينبغي أن نأخذ استراحة أحياناً؟
Didn`t I Say We Should Take Breaks Sometimes?!
On avait dit des vacances de temps en temps !
Tama ni wa Kyuukatte Itta yo ne!
たまには休暇って言ったよね!
